emerging_technologies.name: Neural Lace
emerging_technologies.description: A mesh that can be integrated into the brain to enhance cognitive functions and interface with digital devices.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Could revolutionize treatment for neurological disorders but raises privacy and ethical concerns regarding thought surveillance.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: High initial costs, ethical regulations, and public acceptance of brain-invasive technologies.

emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Personal Energy Management
emerging_technologies.description: AI systems that predict and optimize energy use in homes and businesses based on user behavior and external factors.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduces energy waste, supports environmental sustainability, but might lead to energy monopolies if not regulated.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Integration with smart home systems, cost savings, and government incentives for green technology.

emerging_technologies.name: Quantum Blockchain
emerging_technologies.description: Blockchain technology leveraging quantum computing for enhanced security and scalability.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Provides unprecedented security for transactions but could render current encryption methods obsolete.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Need for quantum computing infrastructure, regulatory acceptance, and transition from classical to quantum systems.

emerging_technologies.name: Autonomous Urban Air Mobility
emerging_technologies.description: Drones and flying vehicles for urban transport, reducing traffic congestion and pollution.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Improves urban mobility but requires significant airspace regulation and infrastructure changes.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Public safety concerns, regulatory frameworks, and integration with existing transport systems.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI Personal Assistants
mainstream_technologies.description: Advanced AI systems integrated into daily life for personal assistance in scheduling, communication, and learning.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widely adopted in both personal and professional environments, with significant improvements in natural language processing and personalization.

mainstream_technologies.name: 5G+ Networks
mainstream_technologies.description: Enhanced 5G networks offering higher speeds, lower latency, and greater device connectivity.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Standard across urban areas, with rural expansion underway, driving advancements in IoT and smart cities.

epoch_themes.description: Focus on ethical considerations in AI development and deployment.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Promotes transparency, accountability, and fairness in AI systems, potentially reducing societal biases.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased regulatory frameworks for AI, public demand for ethical tech, and corporate responsibility initiatives.

epoch_themes.description: Emphasizing space exploration, colonization, and resource exploitation.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Expands human presence beyond Earth, potentially leading to new economic and geopolitical dynamics.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Investment in space technologies, international space agreements, and the emergence of space tourism.
